project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Users can see typing indicators when another user is composing a message
Read receipts are displayed when a recipient has viewed a message
non_functional: Support for at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Provide one-to-one and group video calling functionality with real-time audio and video streaming.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls with less than 2 seconds connection time
Video and audio quality automatically adjusts based on network conditions
Support for at least 4 participants in a group video call without quality degradation

notes: Assumed requirement includes both one-to-one and group communication features. No details provided on platforms (web, mobile), so requirements are platform-agnostic.
